news.title: White House blasts Amazon over tariff cost report: 'Hostile and political act'
news.summary: The White House slammed Amazon for reportedly planning to display the cost of President Donald Trump's tariffs next to the total price of products on its site.

news.title: General Motors beats Wall Street estimates, reassesses full-year guidance amid auto tariffs
news.summary: GM beat expectations but is reassessing its 2025 guidance. GM is suspending any additional stock buybacks amid expected cost increases and industry uncertainty. GM beat expectations in its latest quarter.

news.title: Novo Nordisk opens weight loss drug Wegovy to telehealth; Hims & Hers shares rocket 30%
news.summary: Many compounding pharmacies are restricted from making Wegovy copycats, with rare exceptions. Novo Nordisk is racing to capture more patients.

news.title: Coke keeps full-year forecast, says it expects tariff disruptions to be 'manageable' after Pepsi cuts earnings outlook
news.summary: Coke beat first-quarter earnings estimates, and unlike rival Pepsi, maintained its full-year outlook. The company expects cost hikes from tariffs to be "manageable"

news.title: Pfizer expands cost cuts, tops quarterly profit estimates even as sales fall
news.summary: Pfizer maintained its 2025 guidance but noted it does not include any impact of tariffs or trade policy. Pfizer: "We are unable to predict at this time"

news.title: Hims & Hers’ stock rockets after teaming up with its rival Wegovy maker
news.summary: Health and wellness company Hims & Hers sells alternatives to weight-loss drugs like Wegovy. Hems & Hers is now collaborating with the maker of WeGovy.

news.title: ‘I’m literally afraid to look at my balance’: I have $300K in a 2025 target-date fund. Is there a chance it will recover?
news.summary: “I have no idea at this point how much I have lost,” he says. “I’ve lost a lot. I’m in shock.”

news.title: If you love gold at near record high prices, why not wear it?
news.summary: Gold jewelry can increasingly be appealing for investors. ‘I buy it as a kind of fun way to enjoy the gold you own’

news.title: Pfizer sticks to 2025 profit view as it shrugs off plunging Paxlovid sales for COVID
news.summary: Pfizer’s first-quarter revenue missed analyst estimates as it faces an “uncertain and volatile external environment.”

news.title: Spotify earnings come up short as it warns of short-term noise
news.summary: Spotify missed on earnings and guided for more "noise" to come. The company's stock dropped sharply in premarket trade on Tuesday.
